Victorious Smite.name: Victorious Smite
Victorious Smite.flavor: Striking your foe, you call an ally to your side to attack the same target.
Victorious Smite.effect: As a free action, an ally within 5 squares of you can shift 3 squares and make a basic attack against the target with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Battle Chant.name: Battle Chant
Battle Chant.flavor: You inspire your allies with visions of glory, focusing their attacks on a particular foe.
Battle Chant.target: You and each ally in the burst
Battle Chant.effect: Choose an enemy in the burst. Each target gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Visions of Victory.name: Visions of Victory
Visions of Victory.flavor: Inspired by visions of a glorious victory, your ally unleashes a powerful attack on the foe that you just hit.
Visions of Victory.onHit: 1[W] + Charisma modifier damage. As a free action, an ally of yours adjacent to the target can use an encounter melee attack power against the target, hitting it automatically.
Visions of Victory.onMiss: As a free action, an ally of yours adjacent to the target can use an at-will melee attack power against the target, hitting it automatically.
